OUTLINE : This randomize study . Patients stratify accord Gleason score ( le 7 v least 7 ) race ( black v non-black ) . Patients randomize 1 4 diet group . - Arm I ( Flaxseed-supplemented diet ) : Patients instructed incorporate ground flaxseed daily diet . - Arm II ( Low-fat diet ) : Patients instruct way achieve diet great 20 % total energy dietary fat . - Arm III ( Flaxseed-supplemented , low-fat diet ) : Patients instructed arm I arm II . - Arm IV ( Control diet ) : Patients contact weekly , receive dietary counseling surgery . All patient ingest diet least 3 week complete diet diary surgery . After surgery , patient receive dietary counseling . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 160 patient ( 40 per treatment arm ) accrue study .
